New User for Clearing Firm "571" and Exchange "CBOE" !

AIM Auction Percentage Simple Test Plan-: Test Case 1:Verify that in an AIM auction PO and MO can have Order origin as C-Customer
Test Case 2:Verify that in an AIM auction PO and MO can not have Order origin as F-Firm
Test Case 3:Verify that in an AIM auction PO and MO can have Order origin as M-market maker
Test Case 4:Verify that in an AIM auction PO and MO can have Order origin as N-Market Maker Away
Test Case 5:Verify that in an AIM auction PO and MO can have Order origin as B-Broker Dealer
Test Case 6:Verify that Initiator can submit auction responses
Test Case 7:Verify that for a Percentage simple AIM auction a Fixed response is rejected
Test Case 8:Verify that PO cannot be entered as market order
Test Case 9:Verify that AIM order can not be created when market maker enters PO as limit order and MO as market order
Test Case 10:Verify that PO trades with auction responses and MO and auction responses are cancelled
Test Case 11:Verify that In AIM AON PO and MO are cancelled when PO is not AON and MO is AON
Test Case 12:Verify that In AIM AON regular auction is started when PO is AON and MO is not AON
Test Case 13:Verify that AIM Auction cannot be started if MO is of origin F and both PO and MO have same clearing firm
Test Case 14:Verify that cancel request should not be submitted when users cancels the PO
Test Case 15:Verify that PO and MO trades with each other at MO price when No booked order and no auction responses
Test Case 16:Verify that AIM can end prematurely if product state changes Suspended in between and auction cannot be continued and Allocation should take place as allocation strategies
Test Case 17:Verify that cancel request should not be submitted when users cancels the MO
Test Case 18:Verify that AIM can end prematurely if product state changes Halt in between and auction cannot be continued and Allocation should take place as allocation strategies
Test Case 19:Verify that AIM continues even if the product state changes from Open to Fast
Test Case 20:Verify that AIM AON PO and MO trade with each other during On-going auction any FLEX Auction should be rejected with error code Rejected:Auction in Progress
Test Case 21:Verify that AIM AON PO and MO trade with each other during On-going auction any AIM Auction should be rejected with error code Rejected:Auction in Progress
Test Case 22:Verify that AIM can end prematurely if product state changes Closed in between and auction cannot be continued and Allocation should take place as allocation strategies
Test Case 23:Verify that PO trades with AR1 and MO when trading properties Internalized guaranteed percentage 50 and allocation strategies is defined
